In 2009: rumors of an ACLU lawsuit to end prayer completely in the military began spreading through the Internet, but these rumors were debunked.
Lt: Col. Todd Breasseale, a Defense Department spokesman, stated that there has been no notification from the ACLU about such a lawsuit, calling the claim "utter lunacy."
An ACLU spokeswoman: Molly Kaplan, confirmed that there is no pending lawsuit of this kind and that the ACLU actually defends the rights of all Americans to practice their faith.
